com.azure.storage.common

Class BaseClientBuilder<T extends BaseClientBuilder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.storage.common.BaseClientBuilder<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseBlobClientBuilder, FileClientBuilder, FileServiceClientBuilder, QueueClientBuilder, QueueServiceClientBuilder, ShareClientBuilder

    public abstract class BaseClientBuilder<T extends BaseClientBuilder<T>>
extends Object
    RESERVED FOR INTERNAL USE. Base class for Storage client builders. Holds common code for managing resources and pipeline settings.

      Applies validation of general-purpose requests to builder.
      protected HttpPipeline buildPipeline()
      Assembles the pipeline based on Storage's standard policies and any custom policies set by the user.
      T configuration(Configuration configuration)
      Sets the configuration object used to retrieve environment configuration values used to buildClient the client with when they are not set in the appendBlobClientBuilder, defaults to Configuration.NONE
      T connectionString(String connectionString)
      Sets the connection string for the service, parses it for authentication information (account name, account key)
      T credential(SharedKeyCredential credential)
      Sets the credential used to authorize requests sent to the service

      Sets the blob service endpoint, additionally parses it for information (SAS token, path information, etc.)

      Gets the implementing client builder class.
      protected Configuration getConfiguration()
      Gets the configuration being used to construct the pipeline.
      protected HttpPipeline getPipeline()
      Gets the optional custom pipeline to use in constructed clients.
      protected abstract String getServiceUrlMidfix()
      Gets the storage service segment to use for the URL hostname when assembling from a connection string.
      protected abstract UserAgentPolicy getUserAgentPolicy()
      Gets the user agent policy to use for pipelines constructed by this builder.
      protected boolean hasCredential()
      Whether or not this builder has a credential to use with the pipeline.

      • applyServiceSpecificValidations

        protected abstract void applyServiceSpecificValidations(ResponseValidationPolicyBuilder builder)
        Applies validation of general-purpose requests to builder. Method-specific validations should be performed in the convenience layer.
        Parameters:
        builder - Builder to assemble assertions together.

        public abstract T endpoint(String endpoint)
        Sets the blob service endpoint, additionally parses it for information (SAS token, path information, etc.)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the updated builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If endpoint is null or is a malformed URL.

        Sets the logging configuration for service requests

        If logLevel is not provided, default value of HttpLogDetailLevel.NONE is set.

        Parameters:
        logOptions - The logging configuration to use when sending and receiving HTTP requests/responses.
        Returns:
        the updated builder

      • pipeline

        public final T pipeline(HttpPipeline pipeline)
        Sets the HTTP pipeline to use for the service client. If pipeline is set, all other settings are ignored, aside from endpoint when building clients.
        Parameters:
        pipeline - The HTTP pipeline to use for sending service requests and receiving responses.
        Returns:
        The updated builder.

        protected final HttpPipeline getPipeline()
        Gets the optional custom pipeline to use in constructed clients.
        Returns:
